summary: AN ORDINANCE repealing Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 22.806; amending Chapters 22.801, 22.802, 22.804 and 22.808, and adding a new Section 22.808.025 to the Stormwater, Grading and Drainage Control Code; to clarify the definition of public place; to give the Directors of Construction and Land Use and Engineering authority to revise the stormwater discharge rate requirements for some sites; to amend grading permit requirements; and revising the City's enforcement authority.
